alert.note: Alert for Abbeville; Greenwood (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 8:42AM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...THUNDERSTORMS WITH VERY HEAVY RAINFALL WILL IMPACT SOUTHERN ELBERT...SOUTHERN ABBEVILLE AND SOUTHWESTERN GREENWOOD COUNTIES UNTIL 915 AM EDT... At 841 AM EDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms with torrential rainfall along a line extending from 3 miles southwest of Abbeville to 10 miles southwest of Elberton, and moving east at 15 mph. Locations to be impacted include... Greenwood, Abbeville, Elberton, Calhoun Falls, Bobby Brown State Park, Lake Strom Thurmond, Nancy Hart State Park, Middleton, Lake Russell and Promised Land. Very heavy rainfall rates up to 2 inches per hour will be possible in these areas.
info.instruction: Very heavy rainfall may flood areas with poor drainage, such as ditches and underpasses. Avoid these areas and do not cross flooded roads. Water levels of small streams may also rise rapidly. Seek higher ground if threatened by flood waters.
